markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Specialized Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=6296) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 193 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=244)

**Prerequisites**
[Incredible Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=6293)

</column>

---

You’ve trained your mount to perform in unusual or even extreme circumstances, granting it abilities far beyond others of its kind. Your mount gains one specialization of your choice.

**Special** You can select this feat up to three times. Each time, add a different specialization to your mount. Your mount can’t have more than three specializations.
name: Specialized Mount
